titles.title: To make "America, the Beautiful" the national anthem of the United States of America.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Designates the composition known as "America, the Beautiful" as the national anthem.
